name: batuu-scanner2
description: Javascript Batuu Code Scanner based on [Html5-QRCode](https://github.com/mebjas/html5-qrcode). With additions of Galaxy's Edge Aztec Code mapping based on [Andrew Mohawk's Star Wars Aztec Barcodes](https://github.com/AndrewMohawk/StarwarsAztec). Puzzle based on [15 Puzzle by arnisritins](https://github.com/arnisritins/15-Puzzle).
author: Joseph Kramer
